quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
author: Stephen Chbosky

quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: Where there is love there is life.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Love recognizes no barriers.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Love does not dominate; it cultivates.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: You know you’re in love when you can’t fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
author: David Viscott

quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Love is a friendship set to music.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you’ve been together. Love is about how much you love each other every single day.
author: Unknown

quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: Where there is love there is no darkness.
author: Burton Hills

quote: The giving of love is an education in itself.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Love is not finding someone to live with. It’s finding someone you can’t live without.
author: Rafael Ortiz

quote: Love is the flower you’ve got to let grow.
author: John Lennon

quote: You don’t love someone for their looks, or their clothes, or for their fancy car, but because they sing a song only you can hear.
author: Oscar Wilde
